item.name: mysql.innodb.buffer_pool_bytes_free
item.description: The number of free bytes in the InnoDB Buffer Pool

item.name: mysql.innodb.buffer_pool_bytes_total
item.description: The total number of bytes in the InnoDB Buffer Pool

item.name: mysql.innodb.buffer_pool_bytes_used
item.description: The number of used bytes in the InnoDB Buffer Pool

item.name: mysql.innodb.buffer_pool_dirty
item.description: The total current number of bytes held in dirty pages in the InnoDB buffer pool

master_item.key: mysql.query["SELECT DISTINCT * FROM (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.GLOBAL_STATUS UNION ALL SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.GLOBAL_VARIABLES) AS STATUS","{$MYSQL_USER}","{$MYSQL_PASSWORD}",{$MYSQL_PORT},{$MYSQL_CONN_TIMEOUT}]

item.name: mysql.innodb.buffer_pool_pages_free
item.description: The number of free pages in the InnoDB buffer pool

master_item.key: mysql.query["SELECT DISTINCT * FROM (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.GLOBAL_STATUS UNION ALL SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.GLOBAL_VARIABLES) AS STATUS","{$MYSQL_USER}","{$MYSQL_PASSWORD}",{$MYSQL_PORT},{$MYSQL_CONN_TIMEOUT}]

item.name: mysql.innodb.buffer_pool_pages_total
item.description: The total size of the InnoDB buffer pool, in pages https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.7/en/server-status-variables.html#statvar_Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total

master_item.key: mysql.query["SELECT DISTINCT * FROM (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.GLOBAL_STATUS UNION ALL SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.GLOBAL_VARIABLES) AS STATUS","{$MYSQL_USER}","{$MYSQL_PASSWORD}",{$MYSQL_PORT},{$MYSQL_CONN_TIMEOUT}]

item.name: mysql.innodb.buffer_pool_reads
item.description: The rate of logical reads that InnoDB could not satisfy from the buffer pool, and had to read directly from disk

master_item.key: mysql.query["SELECT DISTINCT * FROM (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.GLOBAL_STATUS UNION ALL SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.GLOBAL_VARIABLES) AS STATUS","{$MYSQL_USER}","{$MYSQL_PASSWORD}",{$MYSQL_PORT},{$MYSQL_CONN_TIMEOUT}]

item.name: mysql.status
item.key: mysql.query["SELECT DISTINCT * FROM (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.GLOBAL_STATUS UNION ALL SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.GLOBAL_VARIABLES) AS STATUS","{$MYSQL_USER}","{$MYSQL_PASSWORD}",{$MYSQL_PORT},{$MYSQL_CONN_TIMEOUT}]
item.description: Service item for data gathering

item.name: mysql.innodb.status
item.description: Service item for data gathering

item.name: mysql.slave.status
item.description: Service item for data gathering

item.name: mysql.replication.last_io_errno
item.description:
The error number of the most recent error that caused the I/O thread to stop
https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.7/en/show-slave-status.html

master_item.key: mysql.query["SHOW SLAVE STATUS","{$MYSQL_USER}","{$MYSQL_PASSWORD}",{$MYSQL_PORT},{$MYSQL_CONN_TIMEOUT}]

item.name: mysql.replication.last_sql_errno
item.description:
The error number of the most recent error that caused the SQL thread to stop
https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.7/en/show-slave-status.html

master_item.key: mysql.query["SHOW SLAVE STATUS","{$MYSQL_USER}","{$MYSQL_PASSWORD}",{$MYSQL_PORT},{$MYSQL_CONN_TIMEOUT}]

item.name: mysql.replication.seconds_behind_master
item.description:
The lag in seconds between the master and the slave
https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.7/en/show-slave-status.html

master_item.key: mysql.query["SHOW SLAVE STATUS","{$MYSQL_USER}","{$MYSQL_PASSWORD}",{$MYSQL_PORT},{$MYSQL_CONN_TIMEOUT}]

item.name: mysql.replication.slave_io_running
item.description: Whether the I/O thread for reading the master's binary log is running. Normally, you want this to be Yes unless you have not yet started replication or have explicitly stopped it with STOP SLAVE

master_item.key: mysql.query["SHOW SLAVE STATUS","{$MYSQL_USER}","{$MYSQL_PASSWORD}",{$MYSQL_PORT},{$MYSQL_CONN_TIMEOUT}]

item.name: mysql.replication.slave_sql_running
item.description: Whether the SQL thread for executing events in the relay log is running. As with the I/O thread, this should normally be Yes

master_item.key: mysql.query["SHOW SLAVE STATUS","{$MYSQL_USER}","{$MYSQL_PASSWORD}",{$MYSQL_PORT},{$MYSQL_CONN_TIMEOUT}]

trigger.expression: {Template DB MySQL Common:mysql.is_alive.max(30)}=0 or {Template DB MySQL Common:mysql.is_alive.nodata(5m)}=1
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}/mysql: is down

trigger.expression: {Template DB MySQL Common:mysql.performance.thread_cache_size.last()} <> -1 and ({Template DB MySQL Common:mysql.performance.thread_cache_size.last()} < (8 + ({Template DB MySQL Common:mysql.net.max_connections_available.last()} / 100)))
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}/mysql: thread cache size is misconfigured

dependency.name: {HOST.NAME}/mysql: is down
dependency.expression: {Template DB MySQL Common:mysql.is_alive.max(30)}=0 or {Template DB MySQL Common:mysql.is_alive.nodata(5m)}=1
